body:
## PR Summary
<!-- summarize your PR between here and the checklist -->

Fix Split-Path -Parent /foo returns the empty string on unix. (#4134)

In the version 6.0.0-rc, on Windows, `Split-Path -Parent "/foo"` returns "\\", but on Unix, it returns an empty string.

This change makes it returns "\\" on Windows and "/" on Unix.

This Pull Request Closes #4134.
